attributes.action: Allow the Disasters Emergency Committee (DEC) appeal for Gaza to be broadcast on the BBC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC has decided not to show the appeal on its channels.

By convention, if all broadcasters do not agree to carry the appeal, none does.

As TV licence payers and Human beings the innocent people suffering in GAZA require our aid and we ask the Prime minister to make the BBC allow the appeal to be broadcasted in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
